# Key Projects (2020–2025) {.header-section}
Below is a curated selection of projects I led or contributed to between 2020 and 2025. Each page summarizes the context, methods, deliverables, and impact.

<a href="contact.qmd" class="btn-github">Work With Me</a>

## Thematic Areas {.section-title}
- **Modeling**: Scenario modeling to guide policy.  
- **Analytics**: Statistical and geospatial analysis for decision-making.  
- **SNT Support**: Data pipelines, stratification, and intervention targeting.  
- **Training**: Capacity building for graduate students.
